value: mountainsday
set
A few hours later
Looks like a perfect timing for me.
set
Who are you, human?
You reek of death.
Must admit finding you hiding here was quite a task.
But I'm rather happy to finally be able to slay you.
You are awfully arrogant for a mere mortal, coming here alone.
*Sigh* Same thing every time.
*Slash*
At inhumane speed Victor cut the big dragon across the neck and wing.
Y-you wretch...
set
Just die already.
Wounded and exhausted from the previous fight, the dragon had no chance against him.
blackscreentransition
A nearly dead Qothus fell before Victor as life left his body.
Hmph, too easy.
Well, can't blame you, after you've already been defeated today.
Now, let's finally finish this.
Victor raised his sword dealing a killing blow.
*Slash*
Finally. This should be the last one...
Contrary to Victor's expectations, nothing unusual happened.
Fuck. So it's not over yet.
blackscreenfade
A few days later
blackscreenunfade
cult
set
I think I ordered you to stop coming here as you please.
Whatever.
In a bad mood, huh?
Having trouble with your silly quest?
Yeah.
I killed the last of the winged pests, but somehow it's not complete.
Maybe time to do some real jobs then?
Hey, you've given me the pass on this hunt.
Because dragons were dangerous to us.
You've driven them to extinction by this point.
I'm not doing it for fun, once I get all of their powers, we won't need to chase that fool.
Hmph, that's just your assumptions.
And you are out of luck now.
Actually, I might have a lead for you.
You aren't trying to make me your dirty work, do you?
You make it sound like I'm some sort of scheming bastard.
You must remember the wretch, Arron? The one who I told you to keep your eyes on?
You know I don't give a damn about weaklings.
And if you did, you'd know he has one notable follower.
